Model Specific Description: This field is used to indicate an identifier attributed to the documented instance of artwork.
This field is used to indicate the type of an identifier attributed to the documented artwork.
This field is used to indicate the institution providing the artwork it's ID.
This field is used to indicate the main name attributed to the documented artwork.
This field is used to indicate the main title attributed to the documented artwork.
This field is used to record the language of the main title attributed to the documented artwork.
This field is used to indicate the formal type of object an artwork is.
This field is used to indicate additional names under which the documented artwork is known. This can be linked to the additional name type and earliest and latest date of use of that name.
This field is used to indicate the type of alternative name that is attributed to the documented artwork.
This field is used to record the language of the alternative name attributed to the documented artwork.
This field is used to indicate the earliest known date for use of this name for the documented artwork.
This field is used to indicate the latest known date for use of this name for the documented artwork.
This field is used to record the organization or individual attributing the alternative name to the documented artwork.
